lineComments.lineContent: console.log('No comments found in review file')
lineContents: console.log('No comments found in review file')
lineComments.text: [SUGGESTION] UX: Silent failure - consider showing user feedback when no comments are found in review file instead of just logging to console.

lineComments.lineContent: console.error('Failed to load review file:', err)
lineContents: console.error('Failed to load review file:', err)
lineComments.text: [WARNING] Error Handling: Failed imports are only logged to console. Consider showing a toast or error message to the user so they know why the import didn't work.
[SUGGESTION] UX: Success feedback only goes to console. Consider showing a brief success notification to confirm the import worked.

src/components/ReviewModal/ReviewModal.t.generalComment: Well-structured component with good separation of concerns. The selection state management is clean.

lineComments.text: [SUGGESTION] DRY: These interfaces (LineComment, FileComment, ReviewData) duplicate types from useComments.ts. Consider exporting and reusing them to maintain a single source of truth.
[SUGGESTION] Accessibility: Using array index as React key. Since comments can be reordered or filtered, consider using a more stable key like a combination of startLine and side.

src/services/ignorePatterns.ts:False.generalComment: Clean implementation with good documentation. The regex escaping fix addresses the earlier security concern.

src/hooks/useGitDiff.ts:False.generalComment: Good use of refs for caching ignore patterns. Clean integration with the Tauri backend.

src/hooks/useComments.ts:False.generalComment: The import logic handles edge cases well with proper counting for both merge and replace modes.
